itemData.name: OBA Long Sleeve Jersey
itemData.description:
In partnership with Cascade Armory, a Bend-based biking apparel brand, we're excited to introduce our inaugural jersey! This piece is ideal for those wanting to celebrate a memorable journey with us or simply show some love for their preferred Oregon Adventure brand. This jersey combines high-quality materials and a well-considered design that suits everyday wear.

Straying from the conventional snug fit of typical biking jerseys, we've chosen a looser fit that allows this jersey to be worn both on and off your bike. While it may add a smidge of drag at high speeds, we believe it aligns better with our ethos at Oregon Bicycle Adventures. And lets be honest, we're not about to set any land speed records out on our bikes, so might as well be comfortable and stylish while we take in the views. 

Features
-Honeycomb ventilated side panels 

- Dimple Jersey Mesh

- Clean Hidden Stitching

- Sublimated Graphics 

- 1x1 Rib for Neck Opening
